price: Alemlerin Rabbi Allah dilemedikçe siz de dileyemezsiniz.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
